NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: Oeno, it pains me to report that the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> has failed.. We should begin the evacuation of the lifeforms inside the <color=orange>Sanctuary.</color>
2 1
OENO: No.. Not after everything we've done to prepare for it! Are we.. certain there is no way the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> will work, Yarrow?
3 2
YARROW: Unfortunately, yes.. I began suspect something was amiss when the memory statue failed to pair with me after activating the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> as expected..
4 3
YARROW: An update: Oeno, a memory statue aboard the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> has suddenly just paired with me!
5 4
YARROW: But.. We were unable to power the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project..</color> Why did this memory statue pair with me erroneously?
6 5
OENO: How exciting, Yarrow! Even if it was delayed - does that mean that the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is now functional?
7 5
YARROW: An update: my disappointment has turned to exasperation.. It appears the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is still inactive - it was only a safeguard that triggered the memory statue to pair with me.
8 7
OENO: To have our hopes raised by a safeguard, after all the work we put into safeguarding the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project..</color> How darkly ironic, Yarrow!
SY EX4 1
SY EX5 7
